title: Watch Live: Pope Francis Delivers Speech During Visit to Canada
content:
1. Watch Live: Pope Francis Delivers Speech During Visit to Canada  The New York Times
  2. Pope Francis visits a former residential school in Alberta, Canada  Washington Post

  4. Pope Francis To Apologize To Indigenous Community On 'Trip Of Penance' To Canada  NBC News
